The hotel has 2 restaurants with some really economic lunch options on weekdays. On a crowded day parking might be a challenge here.

name: harish velala
review: It was a horrible experience, the staff had no coordination and they were changing us 1500 more, i booked using hotwire/expedia which gave me the next day checkout, these people were like no its a same day check out so pay 1500 more, i gave â€¦

name: Thanoj Kumar
review: Check-in process is too late, after waiting more than half n hour thy given the room and which was stil dirty, and not inspected yet. Then changed the room fr other floor In that mini bar was not cleaned,  no hot water and tissues at the washroom..

name: Santanil Dasgupta
review: I have been staying here for so many years but now planning to move some other hotel as their services have come down drastically.  Just to save cost they have implemented permanent glass bottles in which they replenish water . Enquiring â€¦

name: Dipanshu
review:
Great experience! I had requested for a from on a high floor which they gave me. Clean room with quick service and pleasant staff. 
The location was amazing with ready accessibility to central areas. Also the room was quiet and comfortable.

name: Abhijith Manur
review:
Old place, washrooms are not so clean, too small. Sugar with coffee was solidified.
No centralized AC, cold on one side but warm on the other side. Parking is also â€¦

name: Sonam Jain
review: I just wanted to bring 2 terrible incidents in front of the higher management team of Royal Orchid Central. â€¦

name: Ajaya Kumar
review: Excellent service, Best location ðŸ‘ â€¦

name: Falguni varma
review: It is good for VIPs but u will not get satisfaction as room services  are too late and u will be corrupted in restaurant plz do not have dinner there very less quantity just Bade logo ki badi badi batein jo dikhta he woh hota nai hebetter â€¦

name: raseem
review: Checkin was easy. Little hard to find the entry. There is no boards, make sure to take first res buildinh after junction. Rooms and lines are neat and clean. Washroom is bit small but there is a small bathtub as an addition. In the middle â€¦

name: Ashir
review: Excellent hotel for a moderate budget in the range of 3K. Nice breakfast and restaurants. Clean rooms. Prime location on MG road. But it still can be improved to become outstanding. â€¦

name: Satish Mishra
review: I loved my stay here in this hotel. One of the best breakfast I ever have had in any of the hotels in Bengaluru.  Staff is immensely helpful and emphatic. Gym at the top floor is a big plus and coach is a competitive one. Thankfully I didn't missed my gym. One of the best economy hotels in Bengaluru.

name: Mehru Thomas
review: Oriental restaurant had good momos.ads of the hotel seem to be taken 20 yrs ago. Minibar was tampered with. Cup was cracked. Spoon was corroded.Corridors were dirty and not vacuumed - saying the vacuum cleaner was out of order. Curtains â€¦

name: Devika Rathore
review: The service is not at all prompt since the staff had to be reminded to clean rooms, take and return laundry repeatedly. The buffet barely changes (I spent around 8 days unfortunately) and is probably stale owing to my upset stomach. The â€¦

name: Deepak Verma
review: Excellent food quality n service but lacks maintence of exhaust system and poor room upkeep of electrical n TV system

name: dinesh rajpal
review: Rooms are small with limited facilities... Washrooms are not cleaned properly. Gym is very small for name sake only... Gym equipments are old. No swimming pool, no steam, no souna.... Buffet breakfast quality is good but variety is less.

name: Karthik C
review: Located at a most central location. Has a good hall arrangement for corporate parties, with great ambiance and DJ in house. The food was of great taste, and the management manages things well. Has a pool side location as well. All in all have a professional corporate package and serve well

name: Madhusudhan Polina
review: I visited this hotel for a week time to attend workshop. The toilets are not maintained properly. The hotel staff needs to be trained on giving very good customer service. I asked one of the hotel staff to place tissue paper in men's â€¦

name: Venukumar Karunakaran
review: Bathrooms need urgent replacement of flush button for commodes ......otherwise worth the money. Try the 5 beer and 1 snack @ room. It's a good offer

name: Fun club
review: The staff were very friendly and the rooms were clean and comfortable. The check in staff in particular were very helpful.

name: Apshita
review: I prefer staying here for my visit in Bengaluru because of it's hospitality and location. Metro station and shopping destinations like Commercial Street is easily accessible. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They ensure that the â€¦

name: Swamy
review: Extremely disappointed with Food at Royal orchid central. Had booked for dinner for 15 guests- but they had to order and wait for starters every time,  food was stale/cold which we did not expect from the hotel.   Worst of all we had stomach upset overnight due to the food.

name: samuel rajasekar
review: I didn't exactly stay there. I was there for a conference for three days. The conference hall was decent but the staffs were not responsible (they were not refilling the water bottles in the conference during/after lunch). The breakfast was terrible, the lunch was average.

name: Nikita Singh
review: Good place to stay, the rooms are good with all the facilities. Best part is having a bath tubðŸ˜ so you can relax after a stressful day. Nice breakfast and hospitality but the room service is very delayed, you have to make multiple calls then someone will come to resolve the issue. â€¦

name: Babu Kumar
review: I hav a great day  I visited this hotel with my lucky charm

name: Umesh G
review:
My booking has been done in Royal Orchid Hotel in Bengalaru for 2 days

Though this hotel is 4 star but the property doesn't have even 2 star worth it. â€¦

name: N Q
review: Worse hotel i've ever stayed in... The photos you are seeing are fake...they are claiming it 4 star hotel. But isn't even 2 star. Actually it doesn't deserve any star. â€¦

name: Mahesh Ballal
review: Nice place in the heart of the city. After the lockdown it really takes lot's of effort to bring it to the normal, I feel sorry for the satuiaton but the room service food and the front desk are really giving their 100% to bringing it to normal. I wish them good. Certainly a good place to stay.

name: Yashaswini
review: Being a regular in Royal Orchid (have booked rooms multiple times - mg road, Royal Orchid), this time the bathroom was really bad looking, as in the tiles were looking so dirty, looked like they have not been cleaned for months. Also there â€¦

name: haritha veena
review: Excellent to stay with family

name: Srivatsan Raghavan
review: Management has changed. Appetizers are being kept under lock and key and provided on demand basis during buffet. First plate will have 6 paneer pieces and second helping will have 4 pieces and so on. Wine is complimentary with buffet but â€¦

name: Vanita Nandakumar
review: Quite a nice hotel in he CBD area of Bangalore. Their Pinxx restaurant serves a decent fare. With Zomato Gold you can enjoy a starter with main course between two. Went here with my dad tried their Achari fish tikka and Awadhi chicken â€¦

name: Sandipan Chakraborty
review: Decent place to stay near MG road. Staffs are polite. Buffet breakfast has good varieties. Maintenance could have been better and especially in the end of the corridor rooms. Overall good but not great.

name: Sreehari
review: This is One of the worst hotel I havev ever stayed so far inside Bengaluru. The staffs who were at the reception during the day time knows what they're doing and on the other hand the Manager and the staffs from the night shift are useless â€¦

name: Ayush Jayaprabhu
review: The room was horrible, A/C did not work and we had to call the reception minimum of 4 times befofe they picked up and finally at 2AM, they gave us another room. Very disappointed in the hotel as it is supposed to be one of the best in Bangalore

name: Soumyadeep Choudhuri
review: Very Good 4-Star Hotel in the Heart of the City like Bangalore, Buffet Breakfast & Dinner is Awesome Delicious, Service is Excellent. Gym, Indoor Games Room, Massage Spa Available, Only Sad thing is that No Swimming Pool is Available. I â€¦

name: ANUJ SINDHWANI
review:
Worst experience ever in my life.
AC not working
Furniture broken â€¦

name: Shubha KS
review: Visited for dinner... it's delicious

name: abhay pratapsingh
review: Not up to the mark, they don't have packed drinking water, they refill the bottle, not trustable, even the plates and ice is chargeable.

name: ambar bokare
review: Absolutely outstanding place. Amazing location. I stayed for a couple of nights. â€¦

name: Hemanshu Mishra
review: Really nice, comfy and sophisticated hotel in the heart of the city. The environment is extremely peaceful, supplematary services very customer centric and the food is really satisfactory. The staff members are also quite friendly and co-operative.

name: Pragya Singh
review: Room service needs to be improved. You need to call atleast 5 times to make them appear to you and rectify your complaints. Ac is outdated, not at all cooling. Needs to serviced or changed. Mini Refrigerators are only for show. Not at all in working conditions.

name: Anoop Vm
review: My gust  is staying two day . Here . I just contact with u r reception for driver bathroom and stay. But she told me take another room haaa . It,s a good joke â€¦

name: Ramanathan
review: Hotel is good no doubt...........but they will not allow early check in If we ask for Rs 2500 for early check they will say we cant confirm now hotel rules,full days charges include .........I called two times but they dont seem to be â€¦

name: R.Balaji Thirumalai
review: Check in experience is poor, door access was not working and I waited outside of room more than 30min. Reception Staffs especially Varsa (worsa) and Uttaran attitude and behavior is worse. Management should take immediate attention to protect regular business travellers

name: Aviral Kukreja
review: Pathetic hotel. Electrified bathroom fittings , AC not working properly , fungus and seepage on walls, no bottled water. Pls avoid staying in this hotel.

name: ASHISH SHARMA
review:
Only bad thing is Check in time...they made me wait for more than an hour .
But the rooms were soo good no doubt about it.

name: Arjun Anand
review:
Very difficult to find the place as the approach from the main road along the signal is difficult.
Rooms are very small and congested. â€¦

name: Bishwa
review: I asked for drinking water to my room, but even after one hour & 3 calls to their service number, I didn't received the water. It's really horrible service from such an expensive hotel !! Very much disappointed for it. I hope their management should take stringent action on it.

name: Kajal Sethi
review:
Royal orchid central bangalore does not maintain their rooms.
Worst Experience - room is very un-hygiene and smells bad, on reporting got a different room which is equally very bad. Sofa have cuts smell  marble has white â€¦

name: Keshav K Moorthy
review: I am frequent visitor to this hotel, because of proximity to MG road , Richmond road and Cubbon park. You would fall in love with hotel for the greenery you see around it ... However the service experience has gone from good to bad... Last â€¦

name: Shambu Shaji
review: Good service and excellent place. Value for service

name: Roshan Mahanama
review: One of the best locations in Namma Bengaluru. Located just next to MG Road and walking distance from Trinity church metro station. Complimentary breakfast for all guests. The rooms are cozy but keep in mind not to tale the corner rooms â€¦

name: Kunal Kukreja
review:
I checked in at 9:30pm and the restaurant was closed
They had only 3/4 in room dining options
They offered panner butter masala but not chapati!!!! â€¦

name: Maria Saint Onore
review: Minuses: No mosquito nets on windows. No food. No drinking water but in plastic bottles. Hello, we're trying to fight plastic menace here! Get a filter. â€¦

name: Venkateswarlu Cherukuri
review: Good and nice place to stay. I stayed for two days on bussiness visit. Rooms are comfortable. My stay i cluded under MAP plan. Breafast and dinner were served in their restaurent "pinxx". Hotel is located in Manipal center adjascent to M G â€¦

name: Kamla prasad Yadav
review: The staff attitude and the food quality was the worst we have come across in recent times keep it up ðŸ‘ðŸ™ this will be my last visit and please think twice before visiting this hotel â€¦

name: vijaykumar gangangari
review: First of all the receptionist doesn't answer the call, if answered will not send what's requested for. Else, says that to call the facilities team. And if we call them, they answers the call and doesn't send what's requested even after 3 â€¦

name: yaseen pathan
review: Hotel is not much good the reciptionist is doing multiple tasks at a time the management has to be improved n the room n interior is so old n the price is too high comparing to the service they give

name: Edwin
review: Badly maintained. Worms crawling up the bathroom walls. Asked the housekeeping team to clean the room especially the bathroom but they cleaned only the bathroom but the worms were still very much alive and crawling. The air conditioner â€¦

name: Ashwin Dange
review: Old hotel. Rooms are decent, expected more. Worst bit was that there was some maintenance work going on in the room besides ours and it was incessant. We were in the room for 2 days and it went on and on from 9am to 9pm. We did inform the front desk but it fell on deaf ears. All in all, not a hotel I will stay in again ðŸ™ â€¦

name: Anil Sahu
review: Was here for alumni event. The place is located in the heart of city but not really easy to find or spot from the road. Not much of free space or lawn around.. It's just concrete all around. The roof top is pretty good and you can see the â€¦

name: soniya patil
review: I was booked a standard room, the room bed sheets had stains, the loo was not cleant properly. I checked in at 11:30 PM the staff was not available and even the housekeeping was inadequate. Please stay at another hotel if you have choice.

name: Nimish Yedurkar
review: Rooms are not clean, this is biggest problem for me in this hotel. Rest food quality was good for breakfast and dinner

name: Chirag
review: One of the best hotels in the city in terms of room size, service quality and price (pocket friendly). This was my second time at ROC. The hotel is very close to the MG Road. I highly recommend this hotel over any other 5 stars, if you have a budget comstraint.

name: mohammed aseem
review: Awsome experience. Good staff response. Room service is 24/7. Food and amentities are bit expensive but fresh foods. Overall i loved the stay. Thankyou Royal Orchid team.

name: gaurav chechani (InSEARCH)
review: 1 star only for location, other than that- very old hotel, no proper arrangements. Breakfast also was not good.

name: Suyash
review: The hotel was really good and it was a very comfortable and cozy stay.The hotel staff had some issues but nothing serious. overall would definitely recommend staying at this property.

name: Dipak Das
review: So so. Staff  are  terrific. Location  5 star,  only  needs  room  ,toilet  renovation & more  cleanliness. Khana good. Deserts  superb

name: fahad mushtaq
review: The service is awful... They do not resolve issues and request even in three to four hours after placing requests. The meals included in the package are horrible... Slow.. so not worth what they charge for it.. and they are extremely slow â€¦

name: Kumar Mandlaywala
review:
Do not visit. I repeat, Do not visit.
We were 8 members with 8 different rooms. None of the washroom flush were working properly. Checkin took 45 mins. Intercom not working. It's 1 star hotel.

name: Bhupendra Bagde
review: Very pleasant stay

name: Nilesh Ajmere
review: I must say that I made best decision by choosing this hotel for my trip. This was my first trip to Bangalore and I wanted to stay near MG Road, The location is best and so is the hotel and their services pleased me. Best location, neat and â€¦

name: Pinto Vlog (Snap Studio)
review:
Once a good place to stay but no more. Pathetic service by the ppl in hotel
Ask for a iron box ull never get it. Order a curd rice n gravy . The guy taking order is not aware wat gravies are there. For a 4 star the service u give is pathetic as any local lodge.

name: Murshid Bandidos
review: I missed my meeting because no water supply to the bathroom, I can understand the technical issues, but the way the reception manager handle the situation was inappropriate. Not professional and not acceptable in hospitality industry

name: Karthik Shanmugam
review: Good location. Got billed for mini bar item that I didn't take. Anyway to be sure ask them to empty mini bar before entering the room if you are not planning to use it. TIL.

name: Hariesh Asokkumar
review: The location of this venue is perfect and in centre of the city, however the hotel is bit old in terms of facilities and room service. Breakfast buffet here is really good and worth a try

name: Neeraj Bhandari
review: I Had been there for a night on 1st of August. We Booked the room online through MMT more than a month prior to the arrival. After arriving, the reception asked for some extra amount for the stay stating some illogical reasons.

name: Aaron William Andrade
review:
Great experience and good service.
Decent breakfast
No swimming pool. â€¦

name: akash kokadwar
review: Service level is quite low. Property is also old . I will not say it's more than a normal 2 star hotel. They need to improve

name: Naseem
review: amazing hospitality , good staff , they went out of the way to make the experience wonderful . good ambiance . value for money. they gave us our privacy. our stay memorable . special mention to the team .

name: Biplab purohit
review: We had a buffet there. It is good for a family. Though there is not much option in food but for a price 699 it was good. Service is very good. Well maintained ambience. Over all nice for a family and couple.

name: Siddharth
review: Useless policy. Booked a room for a night and had planned to meet a few people to discuss something important, even though I had called up before booking to check if they allow guests to the room, they said yes but once I got there, the â€¦

name: nalsam nalini
review: Have stayed here a few times in the past but the hotel has progressively deteriorated both in terms of cleanliness and staff. Infact they seem to be very short staffed, any extension that is called like in-room dining, house keeping all is â€¦

name: Natasha Bartley
review: Terrible experience with horrible staff. We could not book a cab because of rain and they did not let us wait in a friend's room. Uthran is a scum who does not know how to talk to women. Made two women get out of a room and come to the lobby to book a cab. Never ever go here worst experience by far

name: Nikhil Shenoy
review: The staff is friendly but certain parts of the building needs renovating.. The food is average, definitely room for improvement

name: Ashraf
review: Me and wife had been to Manipal center MG property, At reservation we got keys of the room, but no one helped till the room. The room which was given was so pathetic it was not cleared for the next guest. I.could see condoms on the floor â€¦

name: Dhananjay Yadav
review: Rooms are ok ok, washrooms are clean, bath tub is available, foods are not tasty and too costly. They have centralised air conditioning which is not working properly. Not recommend you from my side

name: Joel Tuscano
review: Excellent Hotel. Courteous and well mannered helpful staff. Rooms are clean, spacious and well maintained and furnished. Buffet spread at pinxx restaurant is excellent. Definitely recommend for a comfortable and pleasant stay!

name: Aspire Stars
review: Room was smelling smoke... Including bedsheets... Though informed hotel staff they didn't do much... The room provided was not as per the booking... I had to convince the night staff to provide additional bed though it was included in my initial booking... Not happy

name: upasana basu
review: Booked the rooftop banquet for a company dinner meet. Great view of the city..Staff is very cordial and food is decent.. Liquor range is good too..Good experience..great for corporate and official location is great..

name: Balbir Singh
review:
It was a wonderful experience staying here and thanks to GM Thakur who really takes care for all the guest.
Balbir

name: Columbus Leonard
review: There are plenty of other hotels in Bangalore, and I've stayed at ~4 of them. I'd recommend choosing another spot. â€¦

name: BUSINESS CREW
review: I really love hotel royal orchid central because it's in near brigade road . And their pinx restaurant good food . And now they started cafe inside it's so nice good place for meeting and meet-up good ambiance . Coffe and flourless chocolate cake is delicious. I like the staff, they are sweet.

name: Gourav Kumar (GK)
review: The experience was too bad, found cobwebs in the room. TV was not working, request to look into it. But no one had attended it. We asked for some plates and spoons and it took around 45 mins to deliver.

name: akshay v
review: It's worst room they provide ... which is not cleaned r maintained well....ist a bad place not at all recommend

name: JAYESH C S PAI
review: Just about ok for a centrally placed Bangalore hotel. Oddly placed inside an office complex on the back side, the Google maps also have a wrong direction. Go for the top floor rooms. At least there is a view. The food in the Chinese â€¦

name: mahesh rathod
review:
Traveled from Mumbai
This hotel is super guest friendly
Loved the infrastructure provided â€¦

name: Subash
review: Day stay 9 -6 policy is very bad. They should go back to their old version which is night with same price . This is why people stopped going here

name: Latha R
review: The first plus of this hotel is that... More than the property I just love the staff out here.. very courteous, smiling, very helpful... one can always find these people very active n working with a smile... the restaurant is very gud... â€¦

name: Vijay Rai
review: Waste. Never try this. Hotel staffs are very arrogant except for 2-3 Kannada speaking staff. â€¦

name: ATIF HUSSAIN
review: Royal orchid Central Bangalore is one of the great hotel of Karnataka. People from every part of India gets a warm welcome here. I visited here for the first time and will like to come here once more. Every staff is cooperative and they special escort to the room with great smile.

name: Raj Shah
review: It was an Amazing Stay. Tapas at the reception made out stay more convenient & comfortable. Bingo to all the maintenance staff & kitchen crew. Nicely made up rooms with all the necessary facilities !

name: Nikhil Modi
review: Surround area is amazing, the window view is also nice. The staff is completely co-operative and try to get the work done. The view in the hotel is also majestic. Just some basic needs of the washroom in the room is not ergonomically â€¦

name: Suresh Gummaraju
review: Very good location. Comfortable stay. A little run down though, the maintenance has dipped a bit.

name: Spurtii Spu
review:
Ging is located on the 10th floor of Royal Orchid Central Bangalore within the compound of Manipal Center.
Ging would be the right place if your looking for Chinese / Hawker Style Street â€¦

name: Riyaz Sheikh
review:
Very bad experience ! Pathetic
Hotel bedsheet blanket they provided us used ones ! ðŸ¤¬ðŸ˜¡ Disgusting
Unfortunately they are located in MG Road â€¦

name: Rajez Mohan
review: Nice hotel for meetings and functions

name: Sajith P.B
review: We had a problem locating the hotel as there are no proper sign board outside. There is no pool. The rooms are a bit small. Location is prime.  I had booked through Goibibo with all cash prepaid. I arrived at 1500 hrs, but the room was not â€¦

name: Sunit Patel
review: Centrally located in Bangalore... Parking challenge during events. Good  place for small conference and events. Decent food and good rooms. Great location and very convenient. Walking  10 minutes distance from metro station

name: Abhishek S
review: Really pathetic service from the front desk wen room s booked online and we have got confirmation on mail and msg on booking confirmation..they made us wait for 2hr in waiting section and finally said ur books not yet confirmed and u have to wait for more time ..

name: Bhimashankar iliger
review: Tata motors has wasted time of us otherwise they would have screened resumes of suitable candidates and called them only to come

name: pranitha purshotham
review: We had a small get together there food was good they served it hot, only one point less coz of parking, otherwise the place is good

name: amith vishnu
review: Worst hospitality, eccentric staff, very bad maintainance, food is average, I would recommend everyone. Don't stay at this horrible property

name: Girish
review: Good hotel Ambience is good. centrally located in Manipal Complex. Nearby MG road, Brigade road. you can cover all areas of Banglore as been centrally located. breakfast variety spread needs improvements. Good Hotel  for Business travels, couples, singles.

name: manish agarwal
review:
Hotel rooms are good but quite disappointed by the service..
After complaining for 4 times on call and twice to the reception, no body attended for solving d problems like tv unit not working, ac temperature not set properly, tea kettle not working, room not yet ready after pre booking also...and many more...

name: Deshank Baranwal
review: Great location and staff service. Hotel rooms are a bit old with old fixtures and worn out furnishing. Room service was prompt. The hotel itself is slightly hidden from the main road, taxi drivers found it difficult to find.

name: Ajitpal Singh
review: Worst hotel ever. Had to wait for more than 1 hour to get the keys to our rooms, as they weren't 'ready'. Another 20 minutes wasted as the room didn't open with the key and they had to fix the lock!

name: Upayan Dutta
review:
Edit based on stay of October 2020.

Very unsafe and unhygienic stay in a hotel with COVID care centre. Stay away â€¦

name: Kashyap Karkar
review:
Worth the money , in heart of Central banglore.

Prices worthy for stay , complimentary breakfast is also great. â€¦

name: sukanta m
review: Excellent location at the centre of Bangalore. Very good food and good service.

name: faraaz ikram
review: A very good place to have an event planned, I couldn't visit the rooms but the 2nd floor hall where the engagement reception was being held was well planned and had ample space. The balcony was clean and even though the view wasn't that good the place was airy

name: Vasanth Paul
review: Pathetic. We had a unpleasant stay at this hotel. Rooms were not ready and room that provided was stinking. Toilet was unclean and no hot water. This hotel is not worth to be a star hotel. I dont recommend this hotel.

name: Prashanth M D
review:
Facility - Very Poor
Breakfast - Not so good
Food - Not so good â€¦

name: Sampath Ganapathy
review:
Staff are polite and courteous.
Property is outdated.
Pathetic food and had to stay in a non a.c room. Staff didn't bother to change the room after multiple requests.

name: NARENDRA KUMAR P
review: Good stay decent room prices in that location....but recently they have started charging unnecessary...like charged for plates when food was ordered from outside...

name: Satish Boddu
review: Hopeless very old hotel, bad maintenance, the Ac is very good and also the view from the room. The refrigerator doesn't work. The front office duty manager tells you about what is right and what is wrong rather than trying to resolve the issue. I may not stay here again

name: Divya Haria
review: Got this hotel as an option for the 3-star category of Institutional Quarantine after my air travel. Room has basic facilities - airy, king-size bed, big bathroom with tub, good view from large windows, decent sized TV and kettle.

name: Shounak Chakraborty
review: I'm on a 14-days stay here. The rooms are really nice and well maintained. The breakfast is great, but the in-room dining options are limited though. Yet to try the spa or the bar

name: Freddy Dass
review:
Roof top party area has a spectacular view of the city.
Wide range & sumptuous snacks, and nice dinner spread with a couple of live cooking stations. Well managed by Chetan Tewari the GM who was personally around. Thanks to Yatra TG for a great evening.

name: Manish Vishnoi
review: Nice place to dine. Only issue is that it is hardly visible from road side. This is a building inside the Manipal centre in Dickenson road. The ambience is good at roof top. Bangalore looks beautiful in the night from here. Parking space available inside

name: Pradeep Jain B.P
review:
Good Restaurant,Nice Food... Very neatly Maintained.
Breakfast Fast had delicious Ragi Idly.
Lunch had open live kitchens which make Pasta, Chole Kulcha etc... All of which were good

name: Nikhil Arora
review:
Good hotels with many facilities
Best for small meeting , get together , company AGM
All at average cost
Superb connectivity

name: Amit Salunkhe
review: Standard rooms are very basic. Gives a feel of OYO rooms. Staff did not respond properly. Had lot of internet issue.

name: Rajiv Nair
review: Had dinner at Pinx. The buffet didn't have too many options - only a single starter. The Kerala style Biryani and fish curry we're good but the rest of the fare was ordinary. The desserts were forgettable.

name: Ashith Pinto
review: Had a very pleasant stay at this hotel.Room service was outstanding. Very comfortable beds and clean bathrooms. Over all value for money

name: varun Baligae
review: Always a fan of Pixx because of midnight meals. But now it's closed by 11 Pm but above Chinese restaurant is open till 1 Am. â€¦

name: Flemin Joy
review: The place has a great ambience and great rooms, they have got an infinity pool and most of the rooms have a great view of greenery outside. It surprising to have a hotel like this with a lot of greenery surrounding it in the city. It's a great place to get way from the city with in the city.

name: ambalika sarkar
review: Smooth check in and very clean rooms. Stayed here overnight and even checking out in the middle of the night was done without any hassle. The location cannot be beat. Highly recommend and would stay again.

name: Local Master
review:
Pretty cool experience...
Bit Bad Service with wifi connectivity
Tv service is panic â€¦

name: m Prasad
review: Amazing experience...... Good service. Best Quality food

name: Rahul Govindwar
review: Pretty good rooms. Club rooms are spacious with good amenities. They offer a lot of varieties in breakfast - continental as well as south and north indian. Dinner was not too impressive.

name: Swati singh
review: I love this hotel. It was my 4th stay here and services were upto the mark like always. Cooperative door-man and reception people. The view out side the window was awesome.

name: Deepali Mukhopadhyay
review: The buffet was good. Biriyani especially was very nice. Very courteous staff. In the desserts section probably addition of ice cream would  enhance the experience.

name: C Eddie

review: One of those old world hotels which is a must-do if you are visiting a place like Mysore. This was our second visit to the hotel and we love the overall ambience. Rooms are huge with high ceilings. We stayed in the Maharaja suites which â€¦

name: Vikrant R
review: A heritage property in a great location ~ but poorly maintained and unprofessionally managed. The bathrooms don't have ventilation and exhaust. So, the rooms stink. The taps are falling off the basin. The white towels have greyed. The â€¦

name: Arun Nair
review:
As the name says the ambience and the service is definitely royal, no complaints about the service and place. But the food ! Disaster.
Never expected sucha cheap quality meal here. This has never happened before but â€¦

name: Prajwal Vv
review: Visited this hotel in the month of June with my family for a small vacation. Less than 1km from the mysuru railway station it is very convenient for travellers. The staff treated us well with a cold tissue and welcome drink. â€¦

name: Anish Kumar
review:
A bit difficult to find. It's more famous as Metropole instead of Royal Orchid.
Room ambience has old world charm.
Food is good. â€¦

name: Manoj Iyer
review: A 5 star hotel lunch was what we had. Tiger trail. An elaborate dining hall with many design cut mirrors on top. English looks and wooden flooring which has aged well. Pani poori and snacks were starters which were okay. Pasta Penne with â€¦

name: Pruthvi Rao
review: Such sweet staff and the vibe is very chill and sweet. The food was average though, loved the chicken steak, chilli chicken and there was this one dish (whose name is something I'm not sure ofðŸ˜…) but I think that was the star dish. Over-all loved it!! â€¦

name: sahana ramesh
review: One of the worst hotel that I have ever visited,the price they quote and the quantity of food they serve doesn't match at all. Not at all worth visiting it even once . Staff are not friendly to the customers they show a lot of arrogance and â€¦

review: We had a wonderful stay. The room was a bit dated but the staff more than made up for it. Special appreciation to the young lady at the reception and the front office manager Vishwanath. The food was lip smacking tasty and the old world ambience was pleasant.

There are a few issues in the rooms but they are being renovated so I'm sure I will come back and revise the rating in the future!

review: Stayed here for a night, the hotel is a old heritage property. Ambience is amazing, Huge balcony's attached to rooms, thier inhouse restaurant and open restaurant tiger trail are good too. All amenities are great. Located in the heart of â€¦

review: Great overall, staff were friendly and Tiger Trail restaurant was delicious( got to eat tandoori phool).  Only thing is walls are not soundproof, was party and was disturbing till 10:30

name: Sapna Kambiranda Datta
review: I am a frequent guest at this hotel. All my visits have been totally pleasant. Good range of food and beverages. Very hospitable team.

name: Somya Agarwal
review: I have been a regular customer of Royal Orchid and I had the worst experience at Royal Orchid Metropole. The wing of AC is the room was attached incorrectly and the remote was not working properly so it disturbed us all night. â€¦

name: Rashmi Hari Prasad
review: Very very disappointed in this hotel. We booked one night here before driving to Kabini the next day and thank heavens it was only one night. Some positives, it has great ambiance, beautiful place, the front staff and restaurant staff were â€¦

name: P V
review:
Very impressed with the hotel.

Well maintained with pleasant outdoor sitting area. Staff were very pleasant. Free to visit. Beats Lalit palace any day.

name: Vibhu Gupta

review:
Consider it like a heritage hotel. It is over 125 years old. Iconic building.
Excellent food, tandoor-kebabs and everything. Best enjoyed in the central court (open air).  Almost royal ambience. Feels like you are dining at a members only â€¦

name: P Jadhav

Superb place.

Although staff is super slow especially in the evening. We wanted to sit in a particular place. Lady went to ask and never returned...there were so many vacant tables.

review: We had a lovely stay at Metropole. The hotel is well-maintained and retains its old-world charm. It was built in 1920 by the Maharaja of Mysuru for his foreign guests. So, it is conveniently located at the centre of the city and is close to â€¦

name: Kinnari Thakker
review: Lovely little hotel. Such a lovely vibe of old and luxurious. Rooms are a bit shabby, but canâ€™t complain, itâ€™s still charming. The courtyard is lovely for lunch and dinner â€” food is ok, but the place is what you go for.

name: Vishnu Prasad Preetham Kumar
review: Loved the green peas pulav here paired with some sweet corn Palak. But they can improve on the ambiance a bit.

name: Krithi Murthy
review: This will be an unforgettable experience for a completely different reason. The staff are outright arrogant and refuse to address the customer respectfully. There is absolutely no value for money. If I had to compare the quantity of food â€¦

name: sushuma n
review: I booked via Agoda and there was a bug with the app. Although I booked two rooms whose capacity was 2 people per room, i confirmed on call the previous day that 5 would be coming over with the hotel - yet no one pointed out that because of â€¦

review: Metropole stands for it Royalty it was in my bucket list and took me 30 years. Born bought up in my Mysore had my first dance with my partner won best dressed up couple on new year eve. But didnâ€™t get a chance to stay. In 2022 November I go â€¦

review: Loved our stay here. The bed was extremely comfortable, the buffet breakfast was delicious as was dinner under the stars. Fabulous location, by the market, and the staff were all delightful.

review: One of the exclusive dining experience in Mysore. The royal building, the serene environs, tasty food served with dignity...everything in its best. review: Historic place, beautiful structure! Restaurant food is not worth the price but buffet breakfast is awesome! Rooms are decent, be careful of sharp edges on old royal style furniture. Not child friendly. Shower and spout sticker is reversed. â€¦

name: Rashi Singh
review: Excellent stay and food like mount watering staff very helpful and courteous

name: Shreyas Shetty
review: We stayed at the Royal Maharaja Suite - The room, is recently renovated and is mind boggling. Worth the stay!

review: The room and bathroom were in totally pathetic condition. Bed was not comfortable and was making lot of noises. Fridge wasnâ€™t working and had a broken door. Breakfast was totally underwhelming and food quality was terrible and breakfast â€¦

Haunter Vibe ..

name: Arjun Harish
review:
An iconic building in the heart of Mysore.

review: As I sat down ordered soup for the start but they gave me starter which I ordered later and whenever I go any hotel they give me water to drink but here like seriously they gave me water  after thirty minutes and finally out of all the misery the ordered butter chicken was cold . 1. This is no palace. It is just so called palace. â€¦

review: It's a heritage hotel which lives upto its expectations. Its said the Mysore King had built this place for hosting his guests here. Had a pleasant stay, the ambience, the feel is really good and different from the high rise corporate and â€¦

review:
Went for lunch to Tiger trail . Service was pathetic, food was below average. Returned the Manchow soup it was yuck.

Fantastic place to be with family and friends. Their menu is good for both vegetarians and non-vegetarians.

review: We went for lunch. Food was good, but the service was badâ€¦ It took over an hour to get the food. By the time the food arrived, we were sort of frustrated. Disappointed because of the service, otherwise this is one of my favorite places to dine for decades

name: Ahmed Ali
review: So I had booked 4 rooms to stay with my family and looking at the excellent reviews and pictures on booking. Com I decided to give a try. But I wish I had opted for other better options.  This place was a let down for a number of reasons. â€¦

Hi GM

review: Had organised a candle light dinner at the courtyard restaurant for my wifeâ€™s birthday. Lovely table set up ! A bit pricy for the modest decor but the fantastic yummy food made the day. The staff are very courteous and helpful. Nice pictures as well.

review: Kind of in the middle of the city, this hotel which is also a heritage  building is almost walking distance or a very short ride away from most of Mysores star attractions. Not far also from its main shopping district. â€¦

name: Arjun
review: special appreciation to naga bhushabam,sivanna,Jagadeesh,Mahesh junti,Preeti.they are doing their roles in a best way.all are polite and friendly.very helpful staff.neat maintenance.food was very tasty.loved the biryani.we stayed in room â€¦

name: Jibran Contractor
review: Been almost 10 years since I last visited this restaurant. Food is good. Loved the ambience but accompanied by horrible service by the staff has left a sour taste in my mouth. Inattentive servers and host have spoiled what would have been a â€¦

review: It's a heritage building with beautiful pictures.  This was a guesthouse  constructed by Mysore Maharaja for British guests. The entrance is compact and good. â€¦

name: Ankur Saraf
review: One of the best Hotels of the Royal City of Mysore.. Experience Royalty and Luxury. Hotel is old property, said to be made for hosting the guests of Wadiyar Family. Presently, maintained by Regenta Hotels, which itself has established its â€¦

name: Sumit Srivastava
review: The property is good and the location of the property is also good. Within 1 Km from the property, you have the royal palace and the market. â€¦

name: Arti Kaushal
review: The ambience  is very welcoming and charming. Amazing  food and service.  I recommend  this place for lovely dinner outing.

name: Rahul raj
review: Great ambience with heritage feel, food tastes great except biryani which is just ordinary. Hospitality and service is really good.

name: Sujesh

review: The property is beautiful. The restaurant staff and manager very efficient. The food served is tasty too. The spoiler are the people managing sales and manning reception. My friend and I stayed for 2 nights, we are both well traveled. How â€¦

Lovely place to stay with family. Excellent ambience, good rooms with balcony, nice restaurant.

name: Somali

Nice cute hotel at a very convenient location.. service , behaviour of staffs were very good. Food was quite good , prices are reasonable.. overall very satisfactory experience 
Good

The good:

review: 5 on 5 for ambience. 3 on 5 for food. I would Not even rate 1 on 5 for service. The most pathetic service I've experienced in my whole life. Even the newest restaurants do not have such pathetic service and management. Calling themselves a â€¦

name: Kaushal Sultania
review:
Hotel needs a renovation.

AC doesn't cool the room. â€¦

name: shashidhara bv

review: Beautiful property and super friendly staff

review: Buffet was ok , vibe of the place is awesome

name: yash5

name: Udhay
review: Peaceful, wonderful stay with good amenities. Breafast with enough options, live counter.

name: vinayak patil
review:
Defused by the ratings.
We entered this hotel but was very disappointing. No water pressure in the bathroom. Ac not working efficiently. Food quality was very low. Just a suggestion to â€¦

name: Anuja Mohanty
review: It's a beautiful, old school construction. The rooms are regal. The best is the food, and the lawn that has an open dining arrangement. The staff is really well mannered and patient. You also get good options for cocktails

name: Himanshu Agarwal

name: Vinayak

review: A very quaint hotel with friendly staff and very large rooms compared to the European owned hotels here. â€¦

name: Zubeida Anjum

review: We had been to Metropole recently for lunch, with my parents . The restaurant ambience is good and the staff was prompt and friendly. Mixed opinion about the food because some of the dishes ordered were lip smacking and some mediocre. Overall a good experience.

name: Deepak
review: It's an old huge bungalow converted into hotel, the original hotel is very old and u fortunately Royal Orchid has not updated it, may be due to pandemic the property was understaff and was unkept. The floor was dusty and furniture had â€¦

name: Krishna Patil
review: Very good hotel to stay very old place but maintained very well good servicess, nice hospitality and it's heart of the city is located

name: Reshma
review: It was indeed a very good decision to book rooms at Royal Orchid Metropole, Mysore. The Heritage room was large and spacious. They were clean and tidy. The staff were very well mannered, prompt and helpful. We ordered dinner which was tasty â€¦

name: vibha a.v.
review: The hotel though located in the heart of the city,has a very calm,peaceful and serene atmosphere within. The staff are very friendly and polite. The carpets in the rooms should definitely be replaced, as they are has antique as the hotel itself and extremely dirty and faded.

name: Naren Bhaskar
review:
Always a good place to visit. Great ambiance, good food. Service can be better
But a good experience overall!

name: K Venkatramana Prasanna
review: One of the best Hotel in Mysore, the antique style building, big size rooms, neat and clean, hygiene with govt guidelines followed well on sanitization as well. â€¦

name: Alex
review: The property gives you a good feel as it is a 100year old guest house built by the Maharaja of Mysore to entertain his guests. â€¦

name: John Sweeney
review: If the Imperial Delhi is a 5, this is a 4. The Metropole is a period hotel - about 1920 so Iâ€™m a fan. Itâ€™s very nice well kept up but do expect period furniture and fixtures â€” all working nicely. That said there are a two tactics: you want â€¦

name: Stevie Dass
review: Visited the cafe. Not a great menu but I can easily spends hours there relaxing! Has a nice vibe to it. Clean and well maintained, friendly staff but the coffees were not great!

name: Shankara K Narayandas
review: This is for the restaurant, which is fabulous. The food, service, vibe and drinks are great. Would definitely recommend you to eat here.

name: Ajay Bhati
review: Located in the heart of the city this beautiful property takes you back to the time of Maharajas.

name: Satish
review:
Located ideally within the city. This is a heritage hotel, very well done,  ambience is very good. 
The sit out dining area is really good and brings memory of a old era that has â€¦

name: Clifton
review: Superb location, great service, courteous staff, heritage property in the heart of city. Would certainly recommend to fellow travellers. Rooms are average in size however have a good balcony. Bathroom is neat and clean with bath tub. Breakfast has a good spread.

name: Gopi
review: Good place for heritage lovers.. Nice stay with good bar and restaurant. Don't miss candle light dinner here

name: karan shorey
review: Metropole is a good place for hanging out with friends especially in the evening or on good weather days. It is located on the main road and there is ample parking space available. I had a buffet, food tastes good. The service was a little â€¦

name: Punitha Madhu
review:
Food was not worth money...only ambience is good...food for the amount we pay...very very less food we get.
Can't beleive they are giving so less quantity of food.. .not worth visiting this place..very disgusting..

name: Colourful Life Pages Saheera Firoz
review: We had a nice stay at this place! Though the rooms  are quite old and need some serious renovations ; the place is calm and serene! Restaurant serves some delicious food too!

name: Aditi
review: An Amazing place.. It took me back to era where high ceilings, antique furniture, balcony etc have stories embedded in them. The staff was very cordial and friendly. Overall a very nice experience. â€¦

name: Anand K R
review: An elegant hotel with splendid interiors. Cozy environment all around and a brilliantly remade heritage building. The food is also very good. Just go for the experience

name: Rahul Anand
review: Campus is good looking but food and service was horrible on the new year eve. They were apologetic for it the next morning, hence 2 stars. Else would have gone for 1.

name: Ullas Kolthur
review: While the location and building is impressive, housekeeping is poor. Found coffee mugs and kettle unwashed from previous guests. Had to call the housekeeping twice to clean it. Expected good service not just for the high price.

name: Rupom
review: The  hotel has a beautiful 19th century ambience which gives a nostalgic feeling. The staff tries their best to make the guests feel at home. only housekeeping staff needs a bit more training to improve communication. â€¦

name: Vijayalakhshmi Kesharwalaa
review:
One of the Classic heritage hotels i have ever stayed in india!
The charming Art deco Vintage building, the lush green surroundings & well maintained trees in their verandah Cafe/ restaurant is so refreshing from the â€¦

name: Rajiv A
review: The quality of the food could be better, we were served with food that was already cold. Some of the staff were very unprofessional and rude to us. Never going to visit here again.

name: Kavana Viswanath
review: The restaurant was not clean, there were ants on the table, and even the food was not so worth it for the price, sugarcane vegetables costed 435, but it was not even worth paying 200. It was my first and last visit to this place

name: Srinivasa Raghavank
review: An excellent place to dine in. Quality Food. Nice ambience. Enjoyed having a sumptuous dinner with a team of 35.

name: Claire Eisenbaum
review:
This review is specifically about the restaurant.
For the positive: it has a lovely ambiance in a courtyard with big trees and the food is good. â€¦

name: Siddalinga Swamy
review: Good ambience ,little expensive,service not up to the mark, full occupancy they cannot give good service what I feel, food was good

name: Nisha Shankar
review:
It's a Heritage hotel.. good Ambience and courteous staffs..But definitely not 5 star standards...
We stayed in a Royal wing which is a standard room. â€¦

name: JÃ©rÃ´me Ã”
review: Very nice hotel, food is very good, gym is useless though

name: Aakash Narayanan
review: Looks super pretty from the outside, rooms are well equipped (spacious enough for two). The rooms have beautiful balconies that face the garden which is the perfect place to have your morning tea.

name: Kunsang Tsering
review: I have been to this hotel few times for lunch and it was very nice. But yesterday when I went my friends, I found a Cockroach in my food and I was shocked how casually they took it after complain. I showed it to a waiter and she immediately â€¦

name: sandeep
review: Its look like an heritage property which you can enjoy but i faced 2-3 issues. When i enter the room from outside, phenoil smell did welcome me and I was feeling the same smell whenever i entered room from outside which was not pleasant. â€¦

name: Aditya
review: This is surely one of the most underrated hotels I have stayed in. What a beautiful place. They also offered me an upgrade when I checked in. Great ambience, superb room quality, very courteous staff, lovely food. I wish I could stay there a little longer. Swimming pool is not great but one can simply enjoy this small property.

name: Clopas Rodrigues
review: An elite dining experience in the centre of the city. Very easily accessible and provides multiple seating options. The bar and outdoor seating is good too. The food is top notch and the service is good.

name: Rajiv Kumar
review: Good place for relaxing getaway. The rooms are spacious with big balconies/sitout area. Nice flora view in the balconies. The restaurant serves good food. A bit on the pricier side though :-)

name: Anoop Palukunnu
review: good ambience. Good food. Expensive. But bar beverages limited selection. They do no have strong beer on the menu.

name: harinder kahlon
review:
Awesome food. Exclent ambiance
Very comfortable ...staff most friendly with Exclent service...simply love this place

name: Navnith Narsimha
review: Quaint, quiet, great service. Busy on the weekends. Good food choices and breakfast buffet spread. No dinner buffet. Heart of the city and near the main attractions, making it easy to get out and about - and back for a quick break if need be.

name: Dusty Rogue
review:
A magnificent place nestled in the middle of Mysore.

Lovely calming ambience. Great place to visit, have some coffee and relax. â€¦

name: Abir Erkens
review: This is a good hotel. The location is great and the area is quiet and well maintained. The price quality is a little out of proportion. The rooms need an update and look somewhat outdated. The food is very tasty.

name: Shikha Gupta
review: Beautiful place, Awesome ambiance and very tasty food. Awesome experience. Love the place very much.

name: rajneesh jha
review: Very good HOTEL and nice food quality but average service

name: Isaura DC
review: Good hotel, nice & clean with excellent staff. The restaurant however was not good and well overprices

name: Partha Natarajan
review: Clean and beautiful heritage property in Mysore. Excellent experience @RoyalorchidMetropole for us. Worth the Royal stay and food.

name: Sanath Kumar
review:
I can understand it's a heritage hotel, however, the fan and the ACs should be upto date.
The AC and fans make this grinding sound and the AC does not even swing. â€¦

name: Gowtham Parashuram
review: Very nice hotel. Ambience is top class. Friendly staff  and great location.

name: Sanchita Sanyal
review: Food in buffet is good but it mostly gets over and they charge a bomb but u hardly get to it. No action taken when guest complain on that. Very unprofessional behaviour of Mr. Harish manager of the hotel. Zero hospitality and courtesy â€¦

name: Varun
review: Set in a old heritage style building, the Metropole exudes character. From the old school chandeliers to the vintage style furniture, it captures the romance of Mysore as a royal playground quite well. â€¦

name: Roy Hessey
review: Nice period hotel. Internet sign on was a nightmare. Could be so simple with a password but no they have to enter your details etc. Shower in dangerous and some day someone will fall entering or exiting. A uni degree is required to operate the taps. Food is good and service is fine.

name: Nandita Singh
review: Beautiful heritage building ...lovely place to sit out and have a candle lit dinner. EXCELLENT food -our order ! Did not stay here so have not seen the rooms ! The building is ground plus one storey !

name: Gopalakrishnan Krishnamurthi
review: We were there only for lunch, which was buffet. To be honest for the money we pay, more than 1k including tax, it is not worth. Very boring menu and not a well spread one. Disappointed with the south indian dishes, which is what we expect â€¦

name: Anita M J /Director - Marketing/ BLR/ KAR
review: Pathetic service. Irresponsible staff and horrible attitude towards customers. No air-conditioning, food was served after almost an hour. Will never recommend this place to anyone ever. Stay away.

name: Vinod Kumar
review: Great place to eat...delicious tasty food courteous staff...don't miss it

name: Raaghu B V
review:
You want to feel roya!!!!
You should come to this hotel

name: Sriprakash Rao Talpady
review: A good buffet spread with varieties of salads.

name: Employedengineer
review: Took my friends here for our dinner the manager was very helpful in helping me organize my dinner with a big group of 30 people The staff is really a courteous and I must say the food is amazing there is nothing as tasty as their food even â€¦

name: kv Gouthami
review: Lovely ambience, staff are very warm, rooms are comfortable. They have taken every precaution against the virus. Staff were masked right through and yet cheerful. I hope I can visit again.

name: Roby Mathew
review: Hotel is good and stay was very beautiful. Satisfied what i have paid and what i have got. Hotel people are very nice and very co operative, provide an excellent service over there. Food was very delicious and hygienic also. Hotel is â€¦

name: Ashwin Rao
review:
One of my favourite places in Mysore. Lovely ambience.
The food and the service at their restaurant could be better. The ambience makes up for this deficit though.

name: Amitabh Sonthalia
review: Went for dinner, but regret the test given, even serving staff disappeared at 10.00 Pm. Remaining staff were not bothered. Place is great but food ..... Believe buffet lunch maybe better because of the number of items to choose from ðŸ˜. may be good place to kill time for foreigners and others. â€¦

name: Santhosh Sethuram
review: Royal indeed! A very beautiful heritage  property in the center of Mysuru. Shikari courtyard restaurant is the center of attraction. Staff is attentive but not intrusive  which is good. Food also appeals to taste buds and you will want to go again.

name: Smitha Satish
review: Never positive.  We have never felt welcomed whenever we chose to visit the place . Hope the team understands and can go beyond their call of duties sometimes  and would not let down their customer

review: Very nice hotel built around the former guesthouse of the Sultan. The staff is very friendly and attentive, the buffet offers an amazing variety of Indian food, plus the usual international/continental breakfast.

name: Sebastian Chandy
review: Beautiful ambience and decor. The service by the staff was immaculate. Great place to stay.

name: Haripriya Jahagirdar
review: Order was not received quickly and upon that it took almost an hour to provide our order. Because of too much of waiting time we were not able to eat anything properly. Not a good experience

name: Raghavendra cs
review:
Visited for Dinner
Good old vibes
Seperate place for drinking smoking lounge and AC halls â€¦

name: Rahul Dev
review:
Went for buffet lunch with family
Ambience - 3/5
Service - 2/5 â€¦

name: Achlys
review: The audacity; the rudeness in the staff is appalling! Had to ask them the same things over n over again.Average food and to top it off,the managers are egositic beyond the benefit of doubt. â€¦

name: Sudershan Singh Gusain
review:
Heritage hotel in Mysuru.
Must try if you are fascinated by the "Old is gold" era. Sort of old meets modern. Antique styling, furniture, high ceilings, large balconies, paintings, â€¦

name: Shreyansh Raj
review: Located at one of the most posh locality of Mysore city,Royal orchid Metropole is a heritage property that was built for catering to guests of royal family of mysore. â€¦

name: Shripad Kanni
review: Visited for casual dinner with family. The staff is extremely courteous that makes you to put this place on favourites. Food is awesome too. The way they maintained this heritage building is big + point apart from being city center...

name: Vaibhav Aradhya
review: One of the best hotel in Mysore. Spacious room. And good balcony space for each room.

name: Abhishek Tripathi
review: Nice place with heritage ambience. Garden restaurant was good. Food was average. Nothing great about it. I have tried food in other royal orchids but then this was not at all near to any of it (w.r.t. Food).

name: kavya shree
review: Very pricy for veg starters with just 6 pieces. No much veg starters option. After ordering the food waiting time is high. Slow service.

name: Rajiv
review: We had the opportunity to stay at this city property as well as the Brindavan Gardens property of Royal Orchid and I must say that our city experience was far better purely we had such wonderful stays. Well mannered staff, great rooms in a fantastic property. We loved staying here.

name: Jesudas Fernandes
review: Very courteous, professional and helpful staff, nice welcome gesture, fantastic ambience, heritage and retro structure. Food is good and tasty!!!

name: Supradipta Sen
review: Old world charm at its best. Built by the Wadiyars in the 1920s as a guest house for visiting European dignitaries. It has a bar, a dining area and an open air cafe in the vast courtyard. Rooms are large and nicely appointed. Each room has â€¦

name: Sudharsan Pandiyan
review: Very good hotel but rooms are slightly small. The breakfast is not that great. But great locality and very well connected to all the touristic attractions located at the heart of the city. Walkable from Mysore junction.

name: Hema R
review: Very nice staff . Very good hospitality provided. Also provided toiletry items and Free breakfast buffet. Wonderful place to stay in Mysore.

name: RAM C
review: Very friendly staff, good & clean rooms and hygienic foods but bit costly so while booking a room select a breakfast menu. Good atmosphere for children and perfect for weekends

name: Deepa Kabade
review: Amazing experience. Awesome property, courteous staff and delicious veg food.

name: sanjith prasad
review: One of the Oldest hotels in Mysore , before it was Metropole and now it's Royal Orchid Metropole, Very nice ambience both indoor and outdoor seating available, Seperate bar lounge, and food taste is also very nice and service is also great. â€¦

name: Pradeep
review: The hotel was very... traditional, nicely maintained. Loved it very much. Breakfast was super awesome and service staff was very courteous !!! â€¦

review: A beautiful restaurant set up in a courtyard with divine food, amazing ambience, courteous staff, and fantastic service! Loved every minute we spent here.

name: Akshaya Gadhadaran
review: Loved this place. The service is amazing. So calm and beautiful place to dine in. The food also was good. Total thumbs-up. ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ â€¦

name: Sumod Nair
review: Great food. Good service and a very royal ambience. Love the place.

name: Aparna C
review: We had booked for one day but after checking in , we decided to stay on another day. Loved the place so much. It has the right ambience to make your stay memorable and happy!!

name: Pawan
review: Excellent hotel. Hotel is value for money also. Service and all are fine there. Check in and check out are very smooth there. Food was perfect no issue. Hotel is located on the prime location. Nice amenities are available over there.Overall properties are very neat AND CLEAN.

name: rohini srivastava
review: If u r staying then also book ur table for dinner..  no lift facility better to book other Hotel

name: Rathinavelu G

review: Classy and heritage building, It's a place to visit for sure for great food and ambiance.

name: Tushar Deshpande
review:
The restaurant service is very lousy.  First the staff forgot half the food I ordered.

review: Good property, Staff are courteous and breakfast spread is very nice ....only thing I didn't like is restaurant since everything is overpriced with no taste at all

name: soumya srikanth
review:
very slow service
please change the manager
not upto the mark

name: vinitha pai
review: Good place. Serene surroundings. Very courteous and friendly staff.  Food was also really good. The spread is huge. â€¦

name: Vj Ks
review: Cosy heritage hotel with superb friendly service and excellent food. Will go back again!

name: mohan manjunath
review: Awesome place , peaceful  , great service good food , loved it

name: Gleggerfriddse

name: Prajwal S

Good place to stay.

name: Ricky

review: Dinner service little bit poor, and conference hall atmosphere not so good,

review: Beautiful hotelâ€¦ came here for a day but immediately decided to extend stay by another.

name: TPN Rao
review: Awesome place to spend an evening with Family and Friends. Great ambiance and mouth watering dishes.
